name: Heroes
description: In order to become a lion-heart and unrivaled hero, you must go through hundreds of training and all the heaven challenge, pass thousands of life-and-death missions to training all your ability

name: World Boss
description: Heaven montera are summonned to harm the world, the 12 vassals have to all gathered with the goal of defeating them and earning thier natural resources. Those monster with space essence contain a lot of valuable resources, destroying them can earn many unbelievable rewards

name: Strategy
description: Simulation of all kinds of strategies which bring themself power could destroy heaven and earth since ancient times. They are modified to match the types of troops to increase the maximum strength of them. For that reason, the strategies are always used by strategists to improve combat power of soldiers.

name: Tavern
description: Heroes of the world are scattered everywhere, only the tavern is the place where talented heroes gather to talk all stories about heaven and earth. Heroes are just ordinary people and will become ashes over time if they don't choose the right master. Who will be the hero in the history books, who will be forgotten in the history line. All of them will depend on your choice.

name: Nation War
description: The dispute of the three forces has been going on for hundreds of years, the country is huge and thousands of miles away, but there are scenes of war and fire everywhere, people's lives are not peaceful for a day, and the cries resounded to the sky. Which force will extinguish the war and pacify the Jiangshan, who will be the son of heaven to unify the country and bring peace to the people.

name: Resources
description: Mineral ores lie thousands of meters deep in the ground, it is extremely difficult to discover and exploit, so mineral ores are extremely precious resources that all forces are always looking for and want to own. Each mineral ore mine produces an extremely large amount of resources, so when it is exploited, it will lead to extremely fierce disputes between the Forces. Whose has those amount of resources that person will be able to control the whole world.
